Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CheckInController
    Check in Controller houses the various methods that the staff can use with regards to the checking in of the guest.
    CheckOutController
    Check out Controller houses the various methods that the staff can use with regards to the checking out of the guest.
    GuestController
    Guest Controller houses the various methods that the staff can use with regards to the guest details.
    MenuController
    Control class to deal with all operations on menu items
    OrderController
    Represents the control class to create, update or remove room service orders.
    PaymentController
    Payment Controller houses the various methods that the staff can use with regards to the updating of room prices, discount and tax rate.
    ReservationController
    ReservationController contains all the methods required by the entity class Reservation and the UI class ReservationUI
    RoomController
    RoomController contains all the methods required by the entity class Room and the UI class RoomUI
